data.description:
SPARK BALL POOL is a social VR billiard game, where you can play with friends through real-time voice, and enjoy the same sense of presence and entertainment as offline billiards. 
Key Features: 
Comfortable Operation: the pool table can be freely rotated, raised, and zoomed in and out; players can set up cues quickly and accurately, adjusting angles easily. 
Available in small-scale space: only a small-scale space is required, sitting mode and standing mode are all available. 
Exquisite-Designed Play Experience: Experience the realistic physics gameplay, use sidespin, exquisite-designed sound effects, and interactive experience.  
Social Gameplay: Go grab your friends, and play billiard with a real in-life person in virtual reality.  
SPARK  BALL POOL will keep constant updates, so please join our Discord for any feedback and suggestions: https://discord.gg/GEePrVGKWH

changelog.change_log:
1.Added Friends System, where you can add friends during the match, check their profile, status, and invite them to start a match.

2.Added Lobby System, where you can interact with other players, and choose different modes by the bar tables. 

3.Added Daily Challenge Feature, players can watch or join the daily trick shots to win coins.

4.In-match scoreboard optimization, you can check the opponents' profiles during the match.

5.Invitation function, when starting invitation mode, you can invite opponents from your friends list or players online. And when receiving an invitation, you can check the inviter's profile and the game modes. 

6.Added the foul prompt after the opening shot failed.

7.Added the prompt when players failed to join a room. 

8.Fixed some collision glitches

9.Improved some sound effects.

10.Rematch Bug Fixed
